show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Say It Like You Mean It! It’s Open Forum on Leid Stories! <!--more--> There’s no point to having a strong opinion about something and keeping it all to yourself.
Let’s hear it!
Step up and grab some air space on “Open Forum,” where great minds gather to trade information, opinions and ideas.
Dare to share your view of the world and of issues and events that matter.
Whether people agree or disagree, the main thing is to buttress your case with credible arguments.
Do so and you will be hailed a champion, for there will be no way to challenge you.
Call in!
Victory is yours … until it isn’t!
